response.overview: Eleven friends. One livestream. Zero idea what awaits.  Craving thrill, a close-knit group follows a viewer’s suggestion—A two-day trip to the remote mountains of Looc, Agojo. But on their first night, four are murdered. Chaos erupts.  The next day, they try to escape—only to be hunted. One by one, they fall. No help. No signal. No mercy.  Then the truth surfaces. The killer is one of them. And her sister, hiding among them, has been pulling the strings all along. Believing ten sacrifices would bring back their dead parents, they kill.  But betrayal turns fatal. The sister dies. One survives.  The ritual fails. The dead stay dead.
response.title: Hutik
